Package modules

Class modules.BSXModule implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

bsxButton

java.awt.Button bsxButton
the Buttons to switch on and off the logging and BSX handling

bsxCheckIt

boolean bsxCheckIt
the states of the Buttons

BSXData

java.lang.String BSXData
holds the BSX description, including the numbers of polygons and edges

bsxWindow

modules.bsx.BSXDisplay bsxWindow
The Frame, where the graphic is drawn

clientVersion

java.lang.String clientVersion
Client Version

intEdges

int intEdges
holds the number of edges in the current polygon as an int

intPolys

int intPolys
holds the number of polygons in the current description as an int

intXPos

int intXPos
holds the X position of the current object as an int

intYPos

int intYPos
holds the Y position of the current object as an int

lastCommand

java.lang.String lastCommand
lastCommand is a Statedescriptor.
if lastCommand.length()=4 then the entire Command has been read else go on reading the command completly
Commands are: PRO SCE VIO DFS DFO TMS RMO RFS RQV PUR additional commands are: BOM EOM LON LOF TXT which will not be supported by Regenbogen BSX java Client.
Commands are preceeded by a @

lastState

int lastState
lastState identifies what we have done last time we received a string
  • -1 undefined -> used to mark succesful work
  • 0 nothing -> go on searching for a new command
  • 1 identifier -> we have to complete the identifier
  • 2 download -> we have to get more BSXData

logButton

java.awt.Button logButton
the Buttons to switch on and off the logging and BSX handling

logging

boolean logging
the states of the Buttons

parent

telnet parent
Our parent, the telnet app.

holds the number of edges in the current polygon as a String

Class telnet implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

address

java.lang.String address
The host address to connect to. This is retrieved from the PARAM tag "address".

connected

boolean connected

emulation

java.lang.String emulation
Emulation type (default is vt320). This can be specified as the PARAM tag "emulation".
See Also:
term, Terminal, TerminalHost

localecho

boolean localecho

modules

java.util.Vector modules
Dynamically loaded modules are stored here.

params

java.util.Hashtable params
This Hashtable contains information retrievable by getParameter() in case the program is run as an application and the AppletStub is missing.

parent

java.awt.Container parent

port

int port
The port number (default ist 23). This can be specified as the PARAM tag "port".

proxy

java.lang.String proxy
The proxy ip address. If this variable is set telnet will try to connect to this address and then send a string to tell the relay where the target host is.
See Also:
address

proxyport

int proxyport
The proxy port number. This is the port where the relay is expected to listen for incoming connections.
See Also:
proxy, port

t

java.lang.Thread t

term

Terminal term
The terminal emulation (dynamically loaded).
See Also:
emulation, Terminal, TerminalHost

tio

TelnetIO tio
The telnet io methods.
See Also:
TelnetIO
